TestCase.Title: Try to select application on OpenPGP card and read data
TestCase.Purpose: Try to select application on OpenPGP card and read data

Precondition.Description: Perform a cold reset of the card in order to ensure all temporary data is removed.

Command.Text: Try to select OpenPGP card with AID

TestStep.TechnicalCommand: var command = new ByteString("00 A4 04 00 06 D2 76 00 01 24 01", HEX); card.gt_sendCommand(command);

Command.Text: Try to get data of card holder

TestStep.TechnicalCommand: var command = new ByteString("00 CA 00 65 00", HEX); card.gt_sendCommand(command);
TestStep.Description: Command GET DATA with 0065 for card holder related data

Command.Text: Try to get data of application

TestStep.TechnicalCommand: var command = new ByteString("00 CA 00 6E 00", HEX); card.gt_sendCommand(command);
TestStep.Description: Command GET DATA with 006E for application related data
